short_summary: Industry Engagement Session for Farm Credit Canada
description: Service Solicitation to support reconciliation with Indigenous Peoples
full_summary:
=====================================

# Industry Engagement Session for Farm Credit Canada's Indigenous Procurement Program

## Overview

Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is hosting a virtual industry engagement session to provide information about its new Indigenous Procurement program. The session aims to educate and engage Indigenous businesses on the program's details and offer guidance on successfully bidding on FCC contracts.

## Session Details

Two virtual sessions will be held:

*   English session: June 12, 2024, at 11 a.m. Central (1 p.m. Eastern/10 a.m. Pacific)
*   French session: June 13, 2024, at 11 a.m. Central (1 p.m. Eastern/10 a.m. Pacific)

## Program Overview

This session is part of FCC's commitment to promoting the economic growth of Indigenous businesses, communities, and Peoples. The Indigenous Procurement program aims to support reconciliation with Indigenous Peoples, as outlined in the Truth and Reconciliation Commission of Canada's Call to Action 92.

## Registration Instructions

To attend the session, please email [indigenousprocurement@fcc-fac.ca](mailto:indigenousprocurement@fcc-fac.ca) with the following information by May 30:

*   First and last name
*   Email address
*   Organization name
*   Preferred session (English or French)
*   Official language for future communication (English or French)

You will receive a Microsoft Teams link and dial-in number by June 6. If you cannot attend, but would like to be notified about future sessions, please email [indigenousprocurement@fcc-fac.ca](mailto:indigenousprocurement@fcc-fac.ca).


## Vendor Registration Guidelines for Indigenous Engagement Session
===============================================================

### Table of Contents
{:toc}

In this document, we provide  guidelines for registering vendors for the Indigenous Engagement Session hosted by Farm Credit Canada.

### Vendor Registration

Farm Credit Canada is hosting a virtual event to promote the introduction of its Indigenous Procurement Program and solicit vendor interest. To sign up, vendors must email a representative from Farm Credit Canada (FCC) to confirm their availability for the event.
